Lyric:
[00:00.44]Wake in Loneliness!! Loneliness!!
[00:03.05]Falling inside your story
[00:05.51]Walking after you!! after you!!
[00:07.83]I will share my time
[00:42.36]迷い込んだ世界で
[00:44.73]僕の影と重なって 今
[00:48.51]I can't go back
[00:51.27]決定的「僕」の証明は
[00:53.83]時代を今超えて 物語る
[00:56.83]You know
[00:57.84]I will be the brand new age
[00:59.95]From this day!!
[01:05.11]I will save myself
[01:07.44]And the time is now!!
[01:09.87]Kill my Weakness!! Weakness!!
[01:12.19]必ず 越えて 泣いて 去って
[01:14.55]And I stay alive!! stay alive!!
[01:16.95]最後を信じたくはなくて!
[01:19.32]Kill my Weakness!! Weakness!!
[01:21.74]いつか気付いたとしても
[01:24.12]I will prove myself
[01:25.62]That I have lived today
[01:28.15]Starting Now!!
[01:35.05]変わり果てた 景色で
[01:37.71]自らの運命知って また
[01:41.29]We'll carry on!!
[01:44.17]決定的「僕」の存在は
[01:46.57]形を変え今響き渡る
[01:49.75]You know
[01:50.50]I will be the brand new age
[01:52.87]From this day!!
[02:02.56]Wake in Loneliness!! Loneliness!!
[02:04.88]いつかは 絶えて 消して 散って
[02:07.29]Walking after you! after you!
[02:09.76]どうなったって悔いはなくて
[02:12.07]Wake in Loneliness!! Loneliness!!
[02:14.50]もう理由なんか無くていいの!
[02:16.90]I will prove myself
[02:18.41]That I have lived today
[02:20.93]Starting Now!!
[02:31.19]I don't know why
[02:33.61]But you saved me
[02:35.72]Wherever you came from
[02:38.55]Feel you inside me
[02:40.86]Maybe it's too late
[02:43.38]I've decided to live
[02:45.74]That only for you
[02:48.16](That only for you)
[02:50.53]I will follow you! follow you!
[02:52.95]If I die for you
[02:55.31]I will lead you! lead you!
[02:57.67]For the brighter future
[03:00.16]Never fade away! fade away!
[03:03.20](fade away! fade away!)
[03:04.99]Keep you close to me! close to me!
[03:07.96](close to me! close to me!)
[03:10.37]Close to me! close to me!
[03:13.48]何年経っても待っても
[03:15.79]さぬ様に抱きかかえた
[03:18.15]ずっと哀しくて虚しくて
[03:20.63]もう先なんてないから
[03:25.42]Kill my Weakness!! Weakness!!
[03:27.68]必ず 越えて 泣いて 去って
[03:30.09]And I stay alive!! stay alive!!
[03:32.44]最後を信じたくはなくて
[03:34.81]Kill my Weakness!! Weakness!!
[03:37.33]いつか気付いたとしても
[03:39.69]I will prove myself that
[03:41.54]I have lived today
[03:43.70]Starting Now!!
